trans-unit.source: Add an XML one-way bridge to process invoice
trans-unit.target: Add an XML one-way bridge to process invoice

trans-unit.source: This topic provides instructions on how to create a <token>msgflow_proj</token> and how to add an <token>one-way</token> to it.
trans-unit.target: This topic provides instructions on how to create a <token>msgflow_proj</token> and how to add an <token>one-way</token> to it.

trans-unit.source: The <token>one-way</token> receives the X12 810 invoice message from the EDI receive bridge and transforms it to a schema in which Contoso, Ltd.
trans-unit.target: The <token>one-way</token> receives the X12 810 invoice message from the EDI receive bridge and transforms it to a schema in which Contoso, Ltd.

trans-unit.source: expects the invoice messages.
trans-unit.target: expects the invoice messages.

trans-unit.source: The bridge also invokes a custom code component that inserts the invoice data (after it is transformed to Contoso, Ltd.’s invoice schema) into a SQL Server database.
trans-unit.target: The bridge also invokes a custom code component that inserts the invoice data (after it is transformed to Contoso, Ltd.’s invoice schema) into a SQL Server database.

trans-unit.source: Instructions related to creating the custom code component and including it in bridge configuration is available at <link xlink:href="edcfee5d-2174-4c80-a6a9-a2d1e9bef977" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Include Custom Code to Use the SQL LOB Target</link>.
trans-unit.target: Instructions related to creating the custom code component and including it in bridge configuration is available at <link xlink:href="edcfee5d-2174-4c80-a6a9-a2d1e9bef977" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Include Custom Code to Use the SQL LOB Target</link>.

trans-unit.source: To add an XML one-way bridge
trans-unit.target: To add an XML one-way bridge

trans-unit.source: Within the <embeddedLabel>CloudCar_Integration</embeddedLabel> solution, add a new <token>msgflow_proj</token>, and name it <userInput>CloudCar_Integration_Invoice</userInput>.
trans-unit.target: Within the <embeddedLabel>CloudCar_Integration</embeddedLabel> solution, add a new <token>msgflow_proj</token>, and name it <userInput>CloudCar_Integration_Invoice</userInput>.

trans-unit.source: In the <embeddedLabel>CloudCar_Integration_Invoice</embeddedLabel> project, from the Solution Explorer, double-click the <embeddedLabel>MessageFlowItinerary.bcs</embeddedLabel> file to open the bridge configuration surface.
trans-unit.target: In the <embeddedLabel>CloudCar_Integration_Invoice</embeddedLabel> project, from the Solution Explorer, double-click the <embeddedLabel>MessageFlowItinerary.bcs</embeddedLabel> file to open the bridge configuration surface.

trans-unit.source: Right-click anywhere on <token>msgflow_proj</token> design surface, select <embeddedLabel>Properties</embeddedLabel>, and update the <embeddedLabel>BizTalk Service URL</embeddedLabel> property to include your <token>af_integration</token> name.
trans-unit.target: Right-click anywhere on <token>msgflow_proj</token> design surface, select <embeddedLabel>Properties</embeddedLabel>, and update the <embeddedLabel>BizTalk Service URL</embeddedLabel> property to include your <token>af_integration</token> name.

trans-unit.source: This is the name that you provided in the <externalLink><linkText>Azure Management Portal</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=211879</linkUri></externalLink> while provisioning <token>af_integration</token>.
trans-unit.target: This is the name that you provided in the <externalLink><linkText>Azure Management Portal</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=211879</linkUri></externalLink> while provisioning <token>af_integration</token>.

trans-unit.source: From the <embeddedLabel>Toolbox</embeddedLabel>, drag and drop the <embeddedLabel><token>one-way</token></embeddedLabel> component to the bridge design surface.
trans-unit.target: From the <embeddedLabel>Toolbox</embeddedLabel>, drag and drop the <embeddedLabel><token>one-way</token></embeddedLabel> component to the bridge design surface.

trans-unit.source: Right-click the <embeddedLabel><token>one-way</token></embeddedLabel>, select <embeddedLabel>Properties</embeddedLabel>, and change the value for <embeddedLabel>Entity Name</embeddedLabel> and <embeddedLabel>Relative Address</embeddedLabel> properties to <userInput>InvoiceBridge</userInput>.
trans-unit.target: Right-click the <embeddedLabel><token>one-way</token></embeddedLabel>, select <embeddedLabel>Properties</embeddedLabel>, and change the value for <embeddedLabel>Entity Name</embeddedLabel> and <embeddedLabel>Relative Address</embeddedLabel> properties to <userInput>InvoiceBridge</userInput>.

trans-unit.source: As a result, the complete endpoint URL where the bridge is deployed, which is shown in the <embeddedLabel>Runtime Address</embeddedLabel> property, will resemble <codeInline>https://<legacyItalic>%%amp;lt;mybiztalkservicename%%amp;gt;</legacyItalic>.biztalk.windows.net/default/InvoiceBridge</codeInline>.
trans-unit.target: As a result, the complete endpoint URL where the bridge is deployed, which is shown in the <embeddedLabel>Runtime Address</embeddedLabel> property, will resemble <codeInline>https://<legacyItalic>%%amp;lt;mybiztalkservicename%%amp;gt;</legacyItalic>.biztalk.windows.net/default/InvoiceBridge</codeInline>.

trans-unit.source: This endpoint receives the X12 810 invoice from the EDI Receive bridge.
trans-unit.target: This endpoint receives the X12 810 invoice from the EDI Receive bridge.

trans-unit.source: Add the following artifacts to the <token>msgflow_proj</token> and save the changes.
trans-unit.target: Add the following artifacts to the <token>msgflow_proj</token> and save the changes.

trans-unit.source: Artifact name
trans-unit.target: Artifact name

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Invoice.xsd
trans-unit.target: Invoice.xsd

trans-unit.source: Message schema in which the invoice is expected
trans-unit.target: Message schema in which the invoice is expected

trans-unit.source: Message schema for X12 810 invoice message
trans-unit.target: Message schema for X12 810 invoice message

trans-unit.source: 810ToInvoice.trfm
trans-unit.target: 810ToInvoice.trfm

trans-unit.source: Transforms X12 810 invoice to Invoice.xsd.
trans-unit.target: Transforms X12 810 invoice to Invoice.xsd.

trans-unit.source: You can download these artifacts, which are included with the sample, uploaded to the MSDN code gallery at <externalLink><linkText>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=324220</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=324220</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: You can download these artifacts, which are included with the sample, uploaded to the MSDN code gallery at <externalLink><linkText>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=324220</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=324220</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: Double-click the <token>one-way</token> to open the <token>msgflow</token> design surface and enter the message type that is processed by the <token>bridge</token>.
trans-unit.target: Double-click the <token>one-way</token> to open the <token>msgflow</token> design surface and enter the message type that is processed by the <token>bridge</token>.

trans-unit.source: To specify the message type, within the <embeddedLabel>Message Types</embeddedLabel> box, select the add icon [ <mediaLinkInline><image xlink:href="fce8ff96-426e-468b-8afd-25eb4c847028" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"></image></mediaLinkInline> ] to open the <embeddedLabel>Message Type Picker</embeddedLabel> dialog box.
trans-unit.target: To specify the message type, within the <embeddedLabel>Message Types</embeddedLabel> box, select the add icon [ <mediaLinkInline><image xlink:href="fce8ff96-426e-468b-8afd-25eb4c847028" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"></image></mediaLinkInline> ] to open the <embeddedLabel>Message Type Picker</embeddedLabel> dialog box.

trans-unit.source: In the <embeddedLabel>Message Type Picker</embeddedLabel> dialog box, from the <embeddedLabel>Available message types</embeddedLabel> box, select the schema for the request message and then select the right arrow icon [ <mediaLinkInline><image xlink:href="a08ed386-6bf6-4164-9052-5f05154d8eff" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"></image></mediaLinkInline> ], and then select <embeddedLabel>OK</embeddedLabel>.
trans-unit.target: In the <embeddedLabel>Message Type Picker</embeddedLabel> dialog box, from the <embeddedLabel>Available message types</embeddedLabel> box, select the schema for the request message and then select the right arrow icon [ <mediaLinkInline><image xlink:href="a08ed386-6bf6-4164-9052-5f05154d8eff" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"></image></mediaLinkInline> ], and then select <embeddedLabel>OK</embeddedLabel>.

trans-unit.source: For this tutorial, select the <embeddedLabel>X12_00401_810.xsd</embeddedLabel> schema because messages with this schema are routed to the <token>bridge</token>.
trans-unit.target: For this tutorial, select the <embeddedLabel>X12_00401_810.xsd</embeddedLabel> schema because messages with this schema are routed to the <token>bridge</token>.

trans-unit.source: The selected schema should now be listed under the <embeddedLabel>Request Message Type</embeddedLabel> box.
trans-unit.target: The selected schema should now be listed under the <embeddedLabel>Request Message Type</embeddedLabel> box.

trans-unit.source: Within the <embeddedLabel>Transform</embeddedLabel> stage, select the <embeddedLabel>Xml Transform</embeddedLabel> activity, and then from the <embeddedLabel>Properties</embeddedLabel> pane, select the ellipsis against the <embeddedLabel>Map</embeddedLabel> property.
trans-unit.target: Within the <embeddedLabel>Transform</embeddedLabel> stage, select the <embeddedLabel>Xml Transform</embeddedLabel> activity, and then from the <embeddedLabel>Properties</embeddedLabel> pane, select the ellipsis against the <embeddedLabel>Map</embeddedLabel> property.

trans-unit.source: In the <embeddedLabel>Map Selection</embeddedLabel> dialog box, select the <embeddedLabel>810ToInvoice.trfm</embeddedLabel> to add it to the bridge configuration.
trans-unit.target: In the <embeddedLabel>Map Selection</embeddedLabel> dialog box, select the <embeddedLabel>810ToInvoice.trfm</embeddedLabel> to add it to the bridge configuration.

trans-unit.source: Save changes to the project.
trans-unit.target: Save changes to the project.
